title: Who is in the cast of Fractured and what is the new Netflix film about?
text:
Sam Worthington is thrown into a gripping mystery in Netflix’s Fractured (Picture: Netflix)

Netflix has left viewers on the edge of their seats with its new original movie Fractured.

The film, which seems to take its cue from the Jodie Foster thriller Flightplan, has sent people flocking to social media to praise the film for its suspenseful plot, not to mention a pretty stellar twist at the centre of it all.

If you haven’t seen it yet you’re missing out – but who stars in the movie, and what’s it about?

Here’s what you need to know…

What is Fractured about?

Fractured tells the story of a family whose six-year-old daughter ends up in hospital after an accident on the way back from a Thanksgiving celebration leaves her with a fractured arm.

However, the father, Ray, finds himself at the centre of a mystery after his wife and child disappear while she is being treated.

To complicate matters the hospital has no record of them even being admitted – with Ray uncovering a sinister plot as he desperately tries to track them down – and cling on to his sanity.

As if that’s not gripping enough, viewers have been left floored by the plot’s twists and turns.

My face after watching that fractured on Netflix pic.twitter.com/MvUk2SyFoT — ashley (@ashleyfindlay_) October 14, 2019

Who is in the cast of Fractured?

What becomes of Ray’s wife and daughter? Viewers have been left on the edge of their seats? (Picture: Netflix)

The film has a pretty impressive cast, led by Sam Worthington as main character Ray Monroe.

British actor Sam is of course best known for the likes of Avatar, in which he played Jake Sully – a role he’s set to reprise in the film’s four planned sequels.

Something sinister is going on (Picture: Netflix)

He’s also been in the likes of Terminator Salvation, Clash Of The Titans, Rogue and Hacksaw Ridge.

American Horror Story star Lily Rabe plays Ray’s wife Joanne Monroe, while the role of six-year-old Peri is played by child actress Lucy Capri.

Other cast members include Adjoa Andoh (Thunderbirds Are Go, Bridgerton) as Dr Jacobs and Stephen Tobolowsky (Silicon Valley, The Goldbergs) as Dr Berthram.

Fractured is available to stream now on Netflix UK.
